content: Understand why 421 Misdirected Request error occurs in connection reuse test
Compare local changes with main branch to identify what broke the test
Found root cause: HTTP/1.1 being negotiated instead of HTTP/2
Fix ALPN negotiation to enable HTTP/2
Test server is negotiating HTTP/1.1 instead of HTTP/2 - need to investigate httptest.StartTLS ALPN configuration
HTTP/2 is now negotiating but getting 495 status and TLS errors - HTTP/2 transport creating new connections instead of reusing
495 status comes from TLS certificate errors in dialTLSHTTP2 - need to prevent new connection creation when connection reuse is enabled
